testcase.name: Decision Engine > makeDecision > pre-task phase > should return CONTINUE if no violations
Decision Engine > makeDecision > pre-task phase > should return BLOCK if violations detected
Decision Engine > makeDecision > post-task phase > should return CONTINUE if no violations
Decision Engine > makeDecision > post-task phase > should return BLOCK if critical violations
Decision Engine > makeDecision > post-task phase > should return BLOCK if high violations (default)
Decision Engine > makeDecision > post-task phase > should return ESCALATE if high violations and allowHighViolations context
Decision Engine > makeDecision > post-task phase > should return ESCALATE if medium violations
Decision Engine > getSeverity > should return null for empty violations
Decision Engine > getSeverity > should return CRITICAL for critical violation types
Decision Engine > getSeverity > should return HIGH for high violation types
Decision Engine > getSeverity > should return MEDIUM for medium violation types
Decision Engine > getSeverity > should return highest severity if mixed violations
Decision Engine > hasCriticalViolations > should return false for empty violations
Decision Engine > hasCriticalViolations > should return true if any critical violation
Decision Engine > hasCriticalViolations > should return false if no critical violations
Decision Engine > summarizeViolations > should return empty summary for no violations
Decision Engine > summarizeViolations > should count violations correctly
Decision Engine > shouldRollback > should return true for BLOCK decision
Decision Engine > shouldRollback > should return false for other decisions
Decision Engine > shouldEscalate > should return true for ESCALATE decision
Decision Engine > shouldEscalate > should return false for other decisions
Escalation Handler > ESCALATION_OPTIONS > should have all required options
Escalation Handler > saveEscalation > should create escalation files
Escalation Handler > saveEscalation > should create instructions file
Escalation Handler > getEscalationFilePath > should return correct path
Escalation Handler > readEscalationFile > should read JSON decision file
Escalation Handler > readEscalationFile > should parse text file with option
Escalation Handler > readEscalationFile > should parse reject option from text
Escalation Handler > readEscalationFile > should parse modify option from text
Escalation Handler > readEscalationFile > should parse abort option from text
Escalation Handler > readEscalationFile > should default to abort on invalid text
Escalation Handler > markEscalationResolved > should update escalation status
Escalation Handler > markEscalationResolved > should handle missing escalation file gracefully
Escalation Handler > Escalation Options Validation > should have unique option values
Escalation Handler > Escalation Options Validation > should have lowercase option values
Execute Task - Path Security > should allow valid alphanumeric taskIds

testcase.name: Execute Task - File System > should verify execute-task.js exists
Git Utils > isWorkingDirectoryClean > should return boolean
Git Utils > getCurrentCommit > should return commit SHA string
Git Utils > getCurrentBranch > should return branch name string
Git Utils > getModifiedFiles > should return array
Git Utils > getStagedFiles > should return array
Git Utils > API validation > should export all required functions
PRD Parser > parsePRD > should parse PRD file successfully
PRD Parser > parsePRD > should throw error if PRD file not found
PRD Parser > extractTitle > should extract title from "# PRD:" format
PRD Parser > extractTitle > should extract title from "# " format
PRD Parser > extractTitle > should return default title if no title found
PRD Parser > extractObjectives > should extract objectives from PRD
PRD Parser > extractAcceptanceCriteria > should extract all ACs from PRD
PRD Parser > extractAcceptanceCriteria > should parse checklist items correctly
PRD Parser > extractOutOfScope > should extract out-of-scope items
PRD Parser > extractTechnicalNotes > should extract technical notes
PRD Parser > generateSubtasksFromACs > should generate subtasks from ACs
PRD Parser > isInScope > should return true for task in AC
PRD Parser > isInScope > should return true for task in objectives
PRD Parser > isInScope > should return false by default if not explicitly in scope (deny by default)
PRD Parser > findSubtaskByAC > should find subtask by AC ID
PRD Parser > findSubtaskByAC > should return null if AC not found
PRD Parser > findSubtaskByAC > should be case-insensitive
Rollback Manager > RollbackState > should create instance with taskId
Rollback Manager > RollbackState > should capture current git state
Rollback Manager > RollbackState > should mark stash created
Rollback Manager > RollbackState > should mark temp commit
Rollback Manager > RollbackState > should serialize to JSON correctly
Rollback Manager > RollbackState > should have valid ISO timestamp
Rollback Manager > RollbackState - Edge Cases > should handle empty taskId
Rollback Manager > RollbackState - Edge Cases > should handle special characters in taskId
Rollback Manager > RollbackState - Edge Cases > should create independent instances
Rollback Manager > API Contract > should have all required methods
Rollback Manager > API Contract > should have all required properties
